Jx.Dialog.Confirm

Extends: Jx.Dialog

Jx.Dialog.Confirm is an extension of Jx.Dialog that allows the developer to prompt their user with e yes/no question.

MooTools.lang Keys

  • confirm.affirmitiveLabel
  • confirm.negativeLabel
